United States Department of Defense DoD and all branches of the military Developed software build process which consisted of pulling multiple language source code from a Microsoft Team Foundation Server TFS version management of source code compile source code into 32bit and 64bit managed and unmanaged assemblies and wrapping them in a hybrid 32bit and 64bit installable packages using industry standard InstallShield Professional packaging software Analyzed designed developed debugged and refactored scripts and C code to streamline the build process improve readability and reusability and
